channel.title: OpenVPN on Chris Titus Tech | Technology Simplified
channel.description: Recent content in OpenVPN on Chris Titus Tech | Technology Simplified

item.title: How to Setup a VPN Server and Clients Using OpenVPN
item.description: In this article, I go over how to setup a VPN Server and clients using OpenVPN. this will cover the setup process of the remote machine and then connecting to it via both Linux and Windows client machines.
